    • startup

      public void startup(ViewController.ObjectToNotify object)
      Description copied from interface: Controller
      Startup the game Stores the current score and compare with the game high score. saves the score if the score is higher or discard if otherwise.
      Specified by:
      startup in interface Controller
      Parameters:
      object - stores all parameters (menu, canvas) that need to be updated during the game

    • update

      public void update()
      Description copied from interface: Controller
      Update the model when the snake eat food. Checks if the game has ended or paused before drawing the snake and food. update the score of the game. draw the snake and the food.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Controller
